name: Dream Mirage (LSDjam demo)
description:
This is something I've wanted to make since i was 16, but i never knew how to even start with a project like this, so i always left it in the back of my mind.
But in 2021 i had some free time before starting uni, so i finally learned how to write code (extremely awful code, but code nonetheless). And now i have this!

But enough backstory, this is a little demo of the game I'm making where you can explore 3 maps; the city, an abandoned building and a weird museum.

So yeah, i hope you guys enjoy it.

Controls:

WADS                  - Movement

Shift                      - Run

Space                   - Jump

Caps Lock            - Autorun

E / Left Click      - Interact

Esc                     - Menu / Pause
